author: Al Jazeera
title: New kids on the block: Welsh town invaded by goats
description: Paying no heed to social distancing rules, a herd of goats has overrun locked-down Llandudno.
content:
A Welsh seaside town has been invaded by a herd of Kashmir goats after the coronavirus lockdown left the streets deserted.
The animals, who normally roam free on a nearby headland jutting out into the Irish Sea, have instead wandered into Llandudno, where th… [+3515 chars]
